review: I owe my positive and normal delivery experience to Dr Joni. I started consulting with her from my 7th month and she was a pillar of strength and support right from the start. She encouraged me a lot for normal delivery and made sure even though I had a long labour to wait and motivate me instead of going for other interventions. She’s available to answer queries and she goes above and beyond to provide quality patient care. Would 200% recommend visiting her!

Dr Joni Patricia James is an angel sent from God to cloudnine hospital to treat patient with utmost care, love, and passion. She prays to Jesus and treats all patients with equality and more dedicated in her work. She cares the patients like a mother.  

Thank you cloudnine for a such a good doctor and all staff for good services overall provided😊👍👏
Friendly Doctor patiently listens and answers to all our queries and suggests all the available best options.
